column3: str
The House Manderville alchemist can readjust your Manderville weaponry attributes.
If you are unhappy with your armament's properties or simply wish to experiment, I shall gladly readjust its aetherial pathways for you.
What will you do?
Readjust the attributes of your Manderville weaponry.
Learn about readjusting Manderville weaponry attributes.
Nothing.
The three attributes you added to your Manderville weaponry can be reselected or rebalanced. As with the initial augmentation, one of these attributes will be set to a lower value than the other two.

The three attributes you added to your Manderville weaponry can be reselected or rebalanced. As with the previous augmentation, one of these attributes will be set to a lower value than the other two.
Once you have readjusted the values to your liking, select “Confirm” to finalize your decision.
Resetting your weaponry's attributes will require an additional chunk of amplifying achondrite, so consider your choices carefully.
Resetting your weaponry's attributes will require an additional chunk of cosmic crystallite, so consider your choices carefully.
The weaponry you currently have equipped is not eligible for readjustment. You must equip the Manderville weaponry you wish to readjust before speaking with the House Manderville alchemist.
Ahem, do you happen to have any more achondrite stashed away? A single chunk is all I require, but it is a rather crucial element...
Chunks of amplifying achondrite can be obtained from Jubrunnah at the aetheryte plaza in Radz–at–Han.
Ahem, do you happen to have any more crystallite stashed away? A single chunk is all I require, but it is a rather crucial element...
Chunks of cosmic crystallite can be obtained from Jubrunnah at the aetheryte plaza in Radz–at–Han.
I'm sorry, but I'm afraid the readjustment process is only available for Manderville weaponry. If you might equip suitable armaments before we begin...?

There we are: perfectly adjusted to your newly stated preferences. Should you have further need of my alchemical manipulations, I shall be stationed here in the High Crucible for the foreseeable future.

Your Manderville weaponry (<If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(68),8))><Sheet(ClassJob,PlayerParameter(68),0)/><Else/><If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(68),18))><Sheet(ClassJob,PlayerParameter(68),0)/><Else/></If></If>) has been readjusted.
